description: Coefficient of x^2 in expansion of (x+1)(x+3)...(x+2n-1).
comments: Equals third left hand column of A161198 triangle divided by 4. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Jun 08 2009
formula: a(n) = sum[(-1)^(k+1-i) 2^(n-1) binomial(i-1, k) s1(n, i), i=k+1..n] with k = 2, where s1(n, i) are unsigned Stirling numbers of the first kind. - Victor Adamchik (adamchik(AT)ux10.sp.cs.cmu.edu), Jan 23 2001E.g.f.: 1/8*(1-2*x)^(-1/2)*log(1-2*x)^2. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 19 2003
prog: (PARI) a(n) = polcoeff(prod(k=1, n, x+2*k-1), 2); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 12 2014
author: _Bill Gosper_
